page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA
page.content: In this rural area, a large percentage of the working population commute daily to nearby towns, to Gatwick Airport, or to London, by car or train. There are some small farms, and the larger houses employ gardeners and cleaners. Beggars Barn Nursery supplies fruit,vegetables,herbs and bedding plants, and employs students periodically. Central Garage also employ two mechanics, a pump attendant, a clerk and an odd job man. Upper Hartfield Post Office Stores is run by the owner, and Coleman's Hatch Post Office also has a delivery service for papers and groceries. The two inns take on bar staff etc. and there is also a Kennels & Cattery,Riding School and there are self-employed builders & plumbers.
